articles.title: Allegri on Nkunku: "Football requires patience and calm"
articles.summary:
After the success at Bologna, Massimiliano Allegri spoke to Sky like this:

On Nkunku: "Football requires patience and calm. The players must be given time to settle in.

articles.title: Rabiot on Milan's season: "It was difficult to do worse than last year. Allegri is giving us something more"
articles.summary:
Adrien Rabiot, author of a goal and an assist this evening against Bologna, released these words to Sky after the match: 

On his moment: "I think I can grow every year. At 30 you're good, you have experience and the mentality.

articles.summary:
Massimiliano Allegri, Milan coach, is present at a press conference in the "Dall'Ara" stadium at the end of the Bologna-Milan match.

Follow his statements live with the live text on MilanNews.

articles.title: LIVE MN - Fofana: "I haven't heard the song for me. The objective is not to fight against Inter, but to do better than last year"

articles.title: Allegri talks about the ending: "At that moment you just have to manage the ball. It's important not to concede a goal"
articles.summary: A great Milan, in a super offensive emergency, showed up at the Dall'Ara stadium and beat Bologna with a net deficit of 0-3.

articles.title: Milan, everything changes in one year: the Rossoneri have 15 points more than last season
articles.summary: How things change in a year. The Milan players who were there last year and the Rossoneri fans who, today, see a totally different team in terms of results, performance and attitude can tell this very well.

articles.title: LIVE MN - Italian: "I was very confident. We prepared everything Milan could be with the ball and without the ball"
